last_episode_to_air.name: Outside the Wire
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kim's accusations threaten maximum damage for Speedo and the Defence Force on Anzac Day. Speedo decides he must reveal the truth about Ted's death.

name: Fighting Season
overview: The story involves an Australian platoon in the Afghanistan war, forced to come home following the death of their leader. A murder mystery involving the now deceased  Captain Ted Nordenfelt ensues.
